mention_address: "Huntington State Beach, Beach Trail, Huntington Beach, Orange County, California, 92646, United States of America"

attraction_reviewComments: We loved the entire Huntington Beach area! The beach is awesome! Lots of good restaurants, places to shop and places for dogs. It doesn't get any better than this!
Large beach, goes for miles with nice clean sand. They have lifeguard stations, restrooms, firepits, paved paths, bike rentals, etc.

Great beach. Nice facilities. Lots of shops & resturaunts & bike/beach rentals nearby. Really worth visiting. The people watching is outstanding!!
